text: Agnidra alextoba is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Ulf Buchsbaum in 2000. It is found on Sumatra. The wingspan is 32–39 mm for males and 36–42 mm for females. The ground colour is yellowish brown. (2000). "Agnidra alextoba sp. n. aus Sumatra (Lepidoptera, Drepanidae)". Mitteilungen der Münchner Entomologischen Gesellschaft. 90: 85-95. ==References== Category:Moths described in 2000 Category:Drepaninae Category:Moths of Indonesia
title: Agnidra alextoba
